item.description:
Let's get together and fix things that we want to repair. (This idea comes from a Grist article on the Repair Cafes in the Netherlands, where people do this regularly).

http://grist.org/list/dutch-repair-cafes-keep-stuff-out-of-the-trash-by-fixing-it-for-free/

For this first meeting, please bring the supplies that are needed to fix whatever items you bring. We can either pass items around the table or fix our own.

Safety note: Since this room doesn't have extra ventilation, please don't bring soldering irons. Also, please bring eye protection or gloves if needed.
item.name: Repair Cafe
